QAPair.Question: What is (are) Kneecap dislocation - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: Your kneecap (patella) sits over the front of your knee joint. As you bend or straighten your knee, the underside of your kneecap glides over a groove in the bones that make up your knee joint. When a kneecap slides partway out of the groove it is called a subluxation., When a kneecap moves fully out of the groove it is called a dislocation.,
